QuestData.Title: Perfect Pitch
QuestData.Description: When the Osul tribe goes to war, they coat their spears and arrows with a highly flammable, ever-burning pitch.$B$BThey use this terrible weapon to shed not only blood, but to raze the homes of their enemies.$B$BI need you to collect some of this pitch while you are in their camp.$B$BWe will use it to show the yaungol that when you play with fire, you can get burned.
QuestData.CompletionText: The yaungol are not content merely to defeat their enemies. No, they would rather destroy and decimate them.
